Screenwriter: Arnold Schulman, Sidney Michaels, Norman Lear
Synopsis: To distance herself from her strict Amish family, na√Øve Rachel Schpitendavel (Britt Ekland) escapes to New York City to become a dancer. While Rachel's dances based on Biblical stories are too innocent for Minsky's Burlesque House, club-owner Billy Minsky (Elliott Gould) plans on using Rachel's routine to humiliate critics of his business. But trouble arises when partners in a comedy duo (Jason Robards, Norman Wisdom) compete for Rachel's affections.
Title: The Night They Raided Minsky's
